page.title: 05BLAGDON VILLAGE CLUB.
page.content: FOR OVER TWO HUNDRED YEARS BLAGDON HAS HAD A VILLAGE CLUB. THE CLUBHOUSE IS ON THE BATH ROAD GOING THROUGH BLAGDON.IT WAS BUILT BECAUSE THE VILLAGERS NEEDED SOMEWHERE TO MEET AND TO RELAX. VILLAGE MEETINGS ARE HELD THERE OTHER WEEK. IN THE GAMES ROOM YOU CAN PLAY SNOOKER, AMERICAN POOL AND TABLE TENNIS. PEOPLE ARE ALWAYS STOPPING BY FOR A GAME OF SNOOKER. THE PEOPLE WHO RUN THE CLUB ARE CALLED MR. AND MRS BROWN. THEY ARE VERY NICE AND THEY RUN IT WELL. EVERY YEAR THEY HOLD A DISCO. THE CLUB HAS CHANGED A LOT OVER THE YEARS. FOR EXAMPLE, A PATIO HAS JUST BEEN BUILT FOR PEOPLE TO SIT IN THE SUN. IT LOOKS VERY NICE NOW WITH FLOWERS ALL AROUND IT. BLAGDON VILLAGE CLUB IS USED A LOT.I ALWAYS ENJOY IT WHEN I GO TO THE CLUB.
